info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued July 12 at 7:56PM MDT until July 12 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Advisory for... Southwestern Otero County in south central New Mexico... Southeastern Dona Ana County in south central New Mexico... Northwestern El Paso County in western Texas...
* Until 900 PM MDT.
* At 756 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was over West El Paso.
HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong winds up to 45 mph.
SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists.
IMPACT...Hazardous travel.
* This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 157 and 164. Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 1 and 37. Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 7.
Locations impacted include... West El Paso, East El Paso, Central El Paso, Northeast El Paso, Far East El Paso, Mission Valley, Chaparral, Horizon City, Santa Teresa, Anthony, Vado, Sunland Park, Canutillo, Anthony Gap, Berino, Vinton, Westway, Fort Bliss, Chamberino, and La Union.
info.instruction: Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; Otero, NM; El Paso, TX
